action.description: Action to use against playbook file(s)

cwd.default: /opt/stackstorm/packs/{% if action_context.parent %}{{ action_context.parent.pack }}{% else %}{{ action_context.pack }}{% endif %}
cwd.description: Working directory where the command will be executed in (default: current pack/workflow dir)

files.description: Data file(s) to encrypt (separated by space). Note that original file(s) will be modified

sudo.description: Lock sudo, the behavior is controlled by ansible 'become_' options

timeout.description: Action timeout in seconds. Action will get killed if it doesn't finish in timeout seconds. Lock as uneeded
